features: Complete Mermaid Stationery Set: Our package includes 20 mermaid-style paper sheets, 10 envelopes, 6 greeting cards with envelopes, a sheet of mermaid tattoo stickers, and a beautiful mermaid tail ink pen. This set is not only aesthetically pleasing but also practical, making it a hit among both boys and girls.

Sea Creature and Mermaid Design: The mermaid-themed letter writing paper features designs of mermaid scales, starfish, scallops, conch, seahorses, and mermaids. The fishtail pen, with its vivid colors and cute mermaid tail shape, adds a touch of whimsy to the set.

Perfect Gifts: This mermaid stationery set makes a fantastic gift for various occasions. It's perfect for mermaid party favors, under-the-sea party favors, sea creature party favors, ocean party favors, mermaid birthday party gifts, or as class reward gift prizes. This beautifully themed gift is sure to delight.

Practical and Reliable: The set includes 20 blank paper sheets, providing ample space for writing, drawing, painting, note-taking, and more. The mermaid pen features 0.5mm black gel ink, providing a smooth writing experience. It's compact and convenient to carry, ensuring a satisfying user experience.

Ideal Size: The mermaid paper measures approximately 7.9*5.5 inches (20 x 14 cm), a cute and compact size. The mermaid scale pens are about 6.7 inches (17 cm) each, easy to hold and use. This makes them suitable for a wide range of ages, from kindergarten students to middle school students.
body.description: Dive into a world of fantasy with our enchanting Mermaid Stationery Set! This comprehensive kit is perfect for any mermaid enthusiast, offering a touch of under-the-sea magic to your daily writing or drawing activities.Package Includes:20 Mermaid-Style Paper Sheets: Each sheet features a unique mermaid scale design, offering a whimsical backdrop for your letters, notes, or sketches.10 Mermaid Envelopes: Beautifully designed with a mermaid theme, these envelopes add a touch of magic to your correspondence.6 Mermaid Greeting Cards with Envelopes: Send your heartfelt messages with our mermaid-themed greeting cards. Each card comes with a matching envelope.Mermaid Tattoo Stickers: Add some mermaid flair to your day with our fun and vibrant tattoo stickers.Mermaid Tail Ink Pen: This beautifully designed pen, shaped like a mermaid's tail, offers a smooth writing experience, making your writing or drawing tasks a delight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mermaid Stationery Set: A Charming Choice for Young Writers
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Mermaid Stationery Set as a gift for my niece, and it's been well-received. This set includes 20 mermaid-themed paper sheets, ten envelopes, six greeting cards with envelopes, pearl crystal stickers, and an ink pen. The design is appealing, especially for children who like mermaids, with its playful and colorful motifs.The paper is of good quality and suitable for writing, and the added stickers offer a nice touch for personalizing letters or invitations. My niece has been using them for various occasions, like party invitations, and as a fun way to stay in touch with friends.Overall, it's an excellent set for encouraging writing and creativity in kids. It's a thoughtful gift for young ones who are fond of mermaids and enjoy writing or sending out their cards and letters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleased with this stationery set!
reviews.reviewText: I was very pleased with this stationary set. It arrived exactly as shown and described. I purchased for my 7 year old granddaughter hoping to encourage her to write letters, decorate them and send to her grandparents and friends!! The mermaid pen will help to make that extra fun!!
